title: Add Date by Days in JavaScript
description: In this lab, we will explore how to add days to a given date in JavaScript. We will create a function that takes in a date and a number of days to add, and returns the resulting date in a string format. We will use the Date constructor and various Date methods to perform the date arithmetic and return the final date.

verify.name: Verify Node Commands in ZSH History
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
